column2: Paramount Group, Inc. is a real estate investment and management company. The company is headquartered in New York, New York and currently employs 321 full-time employees. The firm conducts its business through, and substantially all its interests in properties and investments are held by, Paramount Group Operating Partnership LP (the Operating Partnership). The firm's segments include New York, Washington, D.C. and San Francisco. As of December 31, 2016, the Company's portfolio consisted of 13 Class A office properties aggregating approximately 10.8 million square feet that was 93.3% leased and 90.9% occupied. The firm also has an investment management business, where it serves as the general partner and property manager of certain private equity real estate funds for institutional investors and high-net-worth individuals.
